text: 💬🏥 Access to affordable healthcare is a fundamental human right, not a luxury. Yet, millions of Americans are struggling to afford the care they need. The high cost of healthcare is a major barrier to achieving good health and financial stability.💔 It's heartbreaking to see families making impossible choices between paying for essential medications or putting food on the table. No one should have to sacrifice their health or their financial future just to get by.💡 We need bold action to address the root causes of healthcare affordability. This means expanding access to affordable insurance options, lowering prescription drug costs, and investing in preventative care.🌱 Universal healthcare is a proven solution that has worked in other countries. It's time for the US to join the ranks of nations that prioritize the health and well-being of their people over corporate profits.🤝 We can't afford to wait any longer. Let's come together and demand affordable healthcare for all.        #
